plot: The handsome and lusty young Venetian Casanova has been up to his tricks again and the doge has sent out his guardsmen to arrest him. But.. he has a cunning plan. He will change identities ...
title: A Touch of the Casanovas
plot_es: The handsome and lusty young Venetian Casanova has been up to his tricks again and the doge has sent out his guardsmen to arrest him. But.. he has a cunning plan. He will change identities ...
plot_en: The handsome and lusty young Venetian Casanova has been up to his tricks again and the doge has sent out his guardsmen to arrest him. But.. he has a cunning plan. He will change identities ...
